game.name: Starforged Legacy
game.categories: Single-player, Full controller support, Custom Volume Controls, Playable without Timed Input, Stereo Sound, Family Sharing
game.shortDescription: 살아남아 적을 말살하라! 화력보다 선택이 중요한 SF 함대 서바이벌 게임! 나만의 우주선을 만들고, 판도를 뒤엎을 100+개의 업그레이드로 강화해, 끝없이 쏟아지는 우주 함대를 물리치세요! 온 우주에 유산을 새겨라, 죽는 한이 있어도!
game.shortDescriptionEn: Outlast the onslaught in a sci-fi survivors-like where your decisions matter as much as your firepower. Command customizable starships, enhance your arsenal with 100+ strategy-defining upgrades, and annihilate endless fleets of cosmic combatants! Carve your legacy among the stars and die trying!
